ingredients.ingredient: 1 (2 to 3 pound) whole chicken, cut into pieces

cookingTips: Season chicken with garlic powder before adding sauce for deeper flavor penetration
Add barbecue sauce in the last 20 minutes of baking to prevent charring and burning
Use a meat thermometer to check that thickest parts reach 165°F for food safety
enrichment.coachingPrompt: When should you add barbecue sauce to chicken during baking to maximize flavor while preventing burning?
